cells.data:
-- permutations :: [a] -> [[a]]
on permutations(xs)
    script firstElement
        on |位|(x)
            script tailElements
                on |位|(ys)
                    {{x} & ys}
                end |位|
            end script
            
            concatMap(tailElements, permutations(|delete|(x, xs)))
        end |位|
    end script
    
    if length of xs > 0 then
        concatMap(firstElement, xs)
    else
        {{}}
    end if
end permutations
